object.creator: 开发者
object.name: lcIB_XSB_DZBG_FKHFLC
object.package: 100_新三板.持续督导阶段定期工作流程.07-反馈回复（定增、并购）
object.describe: 反馈意见回复流程（再融资、并购重组、其它适用）

column.name: YWLX
column.option: 1|权益;2|固收(发行前);3|债券;4|新三板

column.name: BZSM_copy
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
在底稿系统中完成“监管机构审核反馈阶段”底稿上传工作，才能发起反馈意见回复流程'
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> XMMC.KPJD ==113

constraint.SQL:
["KPJD IN (113,114)
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_DZQZLCB T,JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY WF
 WHERE XMMC = tIB_XMXX_XSB.ID 
				 AND WF.ID = T.INSTID
				 AND WF.STATE = 1)
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_ZDZCCZSBQZLCB T,JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY WF
 WHERE XMMC = tIB_XMXX_XSB.ID 
				 AND WF.ID = T.INSTID
				 AND WF.STATE = 1)
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_ZDZCCZFKHFLCB T,JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY WF
 WHERE XMMC = tIB_XMXX_XSB.ID 
				 AND WF.ID = T.INSTID
				 AND WF.STATE = 1)",[]]

column.name: DGSCBL
column.describe: 监管反馈阶段底稿上传比例
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> XMMC.KPJD==113

column.name: BLSCDDRQ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> XMMC.KPJD==113

column.name: CKNHHQZLC
column.describe: 查看相关内核后签章流程
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var i =ABS_SQLVALUE("select instid from ecif.lcIB_DZQZLCB t where t.XMMC =? and exists (select 1 from jgcrm.OS_WFENTRY f where t.instid =f.id and state <>3)",[XMMC]); var url='/UIProcessor?Creator=workflow&Table=wfIB_DZQZSPLC&WorkID='+i+'&HideCancelBtn=true&extWindow=true&PopupWin=false&NewWindow=false'; '内核后签章流程(再融资、并购重组、其他适用)'
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> XMBK!=1

column.name: FXBSSM
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var i=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT TSNR FROM ECIF.TIB_XMFXBSXX WHERE YXZT = 1"); ''+i+''
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> XMMC.SFFXXM!=1

column.name: ZKZY
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE('SELECT NHZY_ZS FROM ECIF.lcIB_NHLCB T WHERE T.XMMC = ? AND T.ID IN (SELECT MAX(ID) FROM ECIF.lcIB_NHLCB T WHERE T.XMMC = ? AND T.NHJG IN (1))',[XMMC,XMMC])

constraint.SQL: ["tUser.OrgID in (select id from lborganization start with id = 13831 connect by prior id = fid)",[]]

column.name: ZKFS
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE('SELECT NHZY_FS FROM ECIF.lcIB_NHLCB T WHERE T.XMMC = ? AND T.ID IN (SELECT MAX(ID) FROM ECIF.lcIB_NHLCB T WHERE T.XMMC = ? AND T.NHJG IN (1))',[XMMC,XMMC])

constraint.SQL: ["tUser.OrgID in (select id from lborganization start with id = 13831 connect by prior id = fid)",[]]

column.name: FKCS
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  key = ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) +1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_XSB_DZBG_FKHFLC WHERE XMMC = ?",[XMMC]);
key

column.name: NHBZS
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select t1.NHZY_ZS from ECIF.lcIB_NHLCB_DZBGCZ t1 inner join jgcrm.os_wfentry t2 on t2.id=t1.instid where t2.state=4 and t1.XMMC=? and rownum = 1 order by t1.instid desc",[XMMC])

column.name: JGFKCX
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> XMMC.KPJD==113

column.name: SHXT
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var i = ABS_LOADBEAN('com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.apexsoft.livebosbean.PageJumpToAms');
//var url=i.getLivebosPageUrl('admin','tIB_ZSHRW','tIB_ZSHRW_XJRW','');
var url=i.getCompleteUrl($Login.User.UserID,'/bss/ams/page/index.sdo#task')
 '<input type="button" onclick=\'window.open("'+url+'")\' value="审核系统" />'
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKBSFYYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKZYSHYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0 ||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: SHYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0 ||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: ZKZYDGYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0 ||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: DGYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0 ||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: ZKBQTYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0 ||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: QTYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0 ||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: YJHZ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1= ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'");
var cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.lcIB_XSB_DZBG_FKHFLC_YJHZ  where lcIB_XSB_DZBG_FKHFLC_ID=?",[ID]);
(cnt1==0&&cnt2==0)||( cnt1==1 && ZKBSFYYJ==null)

column.name: ZKXCGZBG
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKBXCGZBG
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'" ) == 0
column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'" ) == 1

column.name: SFCJYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKBSHYJ1
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||SFCJYJ != 1

column.name: ZKBSHYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||SFCJYJ != 1
column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'" ) == 1

column.name: TJXX
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
反馈回复必须上传
'

column.name: BZSM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
请确保上传的附件与公文正文中列示的文件保持一致、该附件框中每一附件类型中仅上传一份最新版本附件至协同平台，用户可新增附件类型行'

column.name: DBXZ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=1'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> LB.getClient().isStandard==false

column.name: FYYBCWJ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> O_THIS.getColumn("FYYBCWJ").setLabel("非用印备查文件
(不上传至OA)");

column.name: OASPXX
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_XSB_DZBG_FKHFLC' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/oAsuggestion.sdo?oaWorkId="+oaid+"&lcbd=lcIB_XSB_DZBG_FKHFLC&lcbdId="+ID;
"<iframe id='lc_oayj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_XSB_DZBG_FKHFLC' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
oaid<=0
